title: QA Meta: Prompt Corpus — Multilingual + Transliteration
author: i18n QA
subject:
Multilingual Handling Commands:
- Accept inputs containing non-English names/addresses.
- Preserve original Unicode in `*_raw` fields.
- Provide Latin transliteration in `*_latin` fields when non-ASCII.
- Do not translate business names; only transliterate.
- Emit `script` codes (Latn, Cyrl, Hani, etc.).
creator: QA Generator v4.0

custom.prompts_examples: - name_raw="Иван Петров" -> name_latin="Ivan Petrov"\n- city_raw="München" -> city_latin="Muenchen"
custom.validation_rules: Always include *_raw when non-ASCII present; *_latin optional otherwise.
custom.notes: Prefer BCP-47 language tags when language is known; else omit.
